response.original_title: Born on the Fourth of July
response.overview: Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, Ron Kovic becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.
response.tagline: A story of innocence lost and courage found.
response.title: Born on the Fourth of July

results.name: Tom Cruise Dances With Donna Before Leaving for Marines Boot Camp
